install.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `k_theme` ( `id_theme` mediumint(64) NOT NULL auto_increment, `themeName` varchar(255) collate utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `themeFolder` varchar(255) collate utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `themeVar` mediumtext collate utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_theme`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
